tha-ap546:19.3: Vissāmabhūmi santānaṃ → vissāsaṃ bhūmisantānaṃ (s2, s3) | vissānabhūmi santānaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap546:28.3: Paccājāto → pacchā jāto (s2, s3, pts1) | sampatto ca (mr)
tha-ap546:31.4: sāriputtamahaddasaṃ → ... mathaddasaṃ (bj, pts1) | sāriputtañca addasaṃ (s2, s3)
tha-ap546:33.4: yugamattaṃ nidakkhitaṃ → yugamattanirikkhataṃ (bj) | udikkhataṃ (s2, s3) | yugamattaṃ nirikkhitaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap546:34.2: avocaṃ mamanucchavaṃ → avocaṃ mananucchavaṃ (bj) | avocamananucchavaṃ (s2, s3) | avocaṃ mananucchaviṃ (pts1)
tha-ap546:38.4: kacci vaṅgīsa jānāsi → saccaṃ vaṅgīsa kacci te (s2, s3, pts1)
